Instruction: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C). In a medium saucepan, mix shortening, salt, and boiling water, heating the mixture until it reaches a full boil. Lower the heat, incorporate the flour all at once, and stir vigorously until a ball forms. Take it off the heat, then add the eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition. Keep beating until the mixture is thick, shiny, and pulls away from the spoon.

Transfer to an ungreased cookie sheet using a piping bag or spoon, then bake for 20 minutes. Lower the heat to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) and continue baking for an additional 20 minutes, or until they are golden and sound hollow when tapped. Allow to cool and then fill.
